job_description:
Accountant

About the Role: We are seeking an experienced Accountant with a strong background in tendering processes and hands-on experience in Tally. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing day-to-day accounts, ensuring statutory compliance, and supporting financial activities related to SEZ operations and tender documentation.

Designation: Accountant

Key Responsibilities: - Handle day-to-day accounting operations using Tally ERP. - Prepare and maintain financial statements, ledgers, and reconciliations. - Manage tender documentation, bid submissions, and financial aspects of tenders. - Ensure compliance with SEZ accounting regulations and statutory requirements. - Coordinate with internal teams, vendors, and auditors for financial reporting. - Monitor accounts payable/receivable and ensure timely closure of books. - Assist in budgeting, cost analysis, and MIS reporting. - Ensure statutory compliance and timely filing of returns (GST, TDS, Income Tax, etc.).

Requirements: - Bachelor’s degree in Commerce / Finance or related field. - 5–7 years of accounting experience, preferably in an SEZ-based company. - Strong working knowledge of Tally ERP and MS Excel. - Experience handling tender-related accounts and documentation. - Excellent understanding of GST, TDS, and statutory compliances. - Strong attention to detail and analytical skills.

Preferred Skills: - Experience in vendor management and tender portals. - Familiarity with SEZ accounting procedures and audits.

Note: Preference will be given to candidates available for immediate joining

Job Type: On-site

job_description:
Software Engineer - Python

We are seeking a passionate Fullstack Developer with 2-4 years of experience to join our growing engineering team. This role focuses on developing scalable web applications with a strong emphasis on accessibility, performance, and usability, utilizing modern tools like Python (Django/FastAPI/Flask) and React.js across the full stack.

We value clean code, thoughtful design, and inclusive user experiences. If you enjoy solving complex problems, care about making the web usable for everyone (including people with disabilities), and want to build impactful software, we encourage you to apply.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and developers to define, develop, and deliver user-centric software solutions.
  • Design and implement accessible and responsive frontend interfaces using React.js, adhering to WCAG and ARIA standards.
  • Build robust, secure, and scalable backend services using Python (Django, Flask, or FastAPI).
  • Develop and maintain RESTful APIs to power frontend interfaces and integrations.
  • Ensure accessibility best practices are integrated into all stages of the development process, including semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast compliance.
  • Debug and optimize applications for performance, usability, and cross-browser compatibility.
  • Work with DevOps to automate deployment workflows and manage applications in cloud environments (AWS preferred).
  • Participate in code reviews and continuously explore and integrate new tools and practices to improve software quality and team productivity.

Requirements:

  • Minimum 2 years of proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
  • Strong proficiency in Python with hands-on experience in FastAPI (preferred). Exposure to Django or Flask will be considered an added advantage.
  • Solid experience with React.js and a strong understanding of modern frontend architecture.
  • Proven ability to create accessible, inclusive, and user-friendly interfaces (familiarity with WCAG 2.1, ARIA roles, etc.).
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.
  • Experience working with REST APIs and integrating third-party services.
  • Familiarity with both SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
  • Experience with code versioning tools, such as Git / Mercurial / SVN.
  • Knowledge of deploying and scaling applications in AWS, Docker, or similar platforms.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@mozilor.com.
summary: Fullstack Developer needed with 2-4 years of experience in Python and React.js. Responsibilities include developing accessible, scalable web applications across the full stack. Apply at careers@mozilor.com.

job_description:
Data Analyst / Analytics Engineer (B2B SaaS)

CookieYes is building a modern, privacy-focused analytics foundation to unify product, marketing, and revenue data. We’re looking for a Data Analyst / Analytics Engineer who can take ownership of CookieYes data infrastructure, ensuring reliability, scalability, and actionable insights across teams.

You’ll implement, maintain and extend data pipelines, warehouse, and BI systems, empowering Product, Growth, and Finance to make confident, data-informed decisions.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Infrastructure Ownership - Maintain and enhance a unified data architecture. - Manage data ingestion from key sources such as MySQL, Stripe, Mixpanel, and other product APIs. - Monitor pipeline health, resolve data discrepancies, and ensure accuracy. - Manage schema documentation, data lineage, and update transformations as business needs evolve.

Business Intelligence & Reporting - Own and maintain dashboards in Power BI, Looker Studio, or Fabric for cross-functional stakeholders. - Support business reporting across MRR, ARPU, churn, LTV, and funnel performance. - Build and automate self-serve dashboards for Product, Growth, and Finance. - Partner with leadership to define KPIs and build high-impact visualisations.

Product & Behavioural Analytics - Maintain product tracking setup in Mixpanel (or equivalent), ensuring consistent event taxonomy and validation. - Collaborate with Product and Engineering to track feature usage, adoption, and retention metrics. - Ensure alignment between product analytics and revenue data for end-to-end insights.

Data Governance & QA - Maintain event taxonomy, naming conventions, and data ownership per domain (Product, Growth, Finance). - Implement QA checks for key metrics and flag anomalies proactively. - Ensure compliance with GDPR and privacy-by-design principles in data handling.

Collaboration & Continuous Improvement - Partner with Product, Engineering, and Growth teams to identify new data needs and enable experimentation (A/B testing, feature flags). - Document data processes and contribute to knowledge-sharing across teams. - Drive best practices for analytics reliability, validation, and reporting consistency.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • 3–5 years of experience in Data Analytics, BI, or Analytics Engineering (preferably in B2B SaaS).
  • Strong proficiency in SQL (joins, CTEs, window functions, query optimisation).
  • Hands-on experience with ETL tools (e.g., dbt, Airbyte, Fivetran, or Apache Spark) and data warehouses (BigQuery, Redshift, Snowflake, or similar).
  • Skilled in Power BI, Looker Studio, or other BI tools for dashboarding and automation.
  • Strong communication skills with the ability to explain data concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

Nice to Have:

  • Experience with Python for automation, transformation, or API integrations.
  • Knowledge of data validation frameworks and monitoring tools.
  • Familiarity with Mixpanel, Amplitude, or other product analytics platforms.
  • Exposure to PLG or freemium SaaS models and experimentation frameworks.
  • Familiarity with privacy and compliance requirements (GDPR, CCPA).

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@mozilor.com
summary: Seeking a Data Analyst/Engineer to own B2B SaaS data infrastructure. Responsibilities include pipeline management, BI reporting, and product analytics for actionable insights.

job_description:
Accessibility Content Writer

We’re looking for an experienced and passionate Content Writer with a deep understanding of digital accessibility to craft inclusive, engaging, and impactful marketing content. Your mission will be to help position our brand as a leader in accessibility by producing content that resonates with both technical and non-technical audiences—while ensuring it meets accessibility best practices.

You’ll collaborate closely with our marketing, design, and product teams to create brand-aligned content that educates, inspires, and promotes accessible digital experiences across channels.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Write clear, engaging, and accessibility-forward content including blog posts, social media copy, thought leadership articles, newsletters, website copy, and campaign assets.
  • Champion inclusive writing standards and accessible content practices across all touchpoints (e.g., using proper alt text, semantic structure, and plain language).
  • Translate technical accessibility concepts into reader-friendly content for broad audiences, including business leaders, marketers, designers, and developers.
  • Collaborate with subject matter experts to ensure messaging is accurate, impactful, and reflective of our brand voice.
  • Optimise content for SEO while maintaining accessibility integrity.
  • Stay up to date with accessibility trends, tools, and guidelines (WCAG, ARIA, ADA, etc.), and reflect them in all content.
  • Help evolve and maintain accessibility-conscious content guidelines for the brand.

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of experience in content writing, copywriting, or brand storytelling—ideally within tech, SaaS, or B2B marketing.
  • Strong knowledge of digital accessibility principles, inclusive language, and accessible content creation.
  • Excellent written communication skills with a sharp eye for clarity, tone, and structure.
  • Comfortable working with accessibility terms (e.g., WCAG, screen readers, alt text) and translating them into approachable language.
  • Familiar with tools like content editors, CMS platforms, and accessibility checkers (e.g., Hemingway, Grammarly, Axe, WAVE).
  • Able to write for multiple formats: long-form articles, short-form social, email campaigns, and landing pages.

Bonus if You Have:

  • Experience working with or in advocacy for people with disabilities.
  • Background in UX writing or inclusive design.
  • A good understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Experience writing scripts for accessible videos, webinars, or presentations.
  • SEO or content strategy skills.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@mozilor.com
summary: Seeking an experienced Content Writer knowledgeable in digital accessibility to create inclusive marketing content. Responsibilities include writing, championing accessibility standards, and collaborating with teams for accessible digital experiences.

job_description:
AI/ML Engineer

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions and services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans numerous technology domains, including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, and Vue, catering to diverse industry verticals globally.

What’s important to us:

We are seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers to drive new international business opportunities. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for text, code, and multi-modal data use cases.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage scalable, observable, and cost-efficient machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure).
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Manage the entire model lifecycle, from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 3 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop and demonstrate proofs of concept for AI/ML-based solutions and services to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines for web-scale usage.
  • Design, develop, and implement state-of-the-art Generative AI models.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience building at least one production-grade Deep Learning or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming, including code optimization, profiling, multi-threading, multiprocessing, and OOP principles.
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models (text, vision, audio).
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment with experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various bonus programs (training hours, certifications, idea & innovation).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@techversantinfotech.com
summary: Seeking an AI/ML Engineer to develop and deploy production-level ML/DL and Generative AI solutions. Requires Python expertise, cloud-native deployment, and MLOps experience.

Core Requirements: - Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems. - Develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and services and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders. - Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures. - Create Functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions. - Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines that can be used on a web scale. - Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions. - Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design. - Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep learning solution or Generative AI solution. - Expertise in Python programming with a focus on: - Code optimization and profiling - Multi-threading and multiprocessing - Object-oriented programming and design principles - Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices. - Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops. - Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. - Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack: - Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python. - ML/DL Frameworks: - Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM - Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras - GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework - Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes - Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2 - Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB - Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

job_description:

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. We are looking for a visionary yet hands-on AI Solution Architect who thrives at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This is a client-facing leadership role for someone who can conceptualize, design, and deliver robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of the curve with emerging AI trends and technologies.

You will be responsible for the entire lifecycle of AI solution development – from client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement & Consulting
    • Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.
    • Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies clearly.

  • Solution Design & Architecture
    • Define end-to-end AI architecture including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.
    • Make informed choices of AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure the architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.
  • Hands-On Development
    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts when needed.
    • Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations.
    • Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.
  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight
    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.
    • Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout SDLC.

Must-Have Skills:

  • AI/ML/DL Expertise:
    • Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
    • Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs).
    • Hands-on with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.
  • Architecture & System Design:
    • Strong grasp on designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture.
    • Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
  • Cloud & Platforms:
    • Proficient in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio).
    • Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).

    • Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning.

  • Soft Skills:

About the Job

As a specialist in electronics and software for the past 20 years, in-tech is a dynamic, fast-growing engineering company headquartered in Munich, Germany, employing around 2350 employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries.

in-tech develops innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defence, and industrial sectors.

We are committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance. Our colour orange stands for liveliness, warmth, and dynamism. We value a strong team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture. We call it the “Orange Spirit”!

Since 2024, in-tech became a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd. This strategic partnership enables us to offer our customers even more comprehensive development and digitalisation services and a greater offshore capability.

We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team based out of our Kochi location with hybrid work options. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic team with a company with a positive culture and team spirit, we’d love to connect with you!

Responsibilities

  1. Responsibility and operation of the DevSecOps infrastructure
  2. Proxmox and Proxmox backup infrastructure.
  3. GitHub Cloud and On-Premises (Enterprise License).
  4. GitHub Runner On-Premises (Windows, Mac dedicated hardware, Linux).
  5. Artifactory, including selection and migration to alternative solutions that also support the performance of security checks, e.g., based on SBOMs.
  6. Development and implementation of CI/CD solutions.
  7. Supporting the development and project teams with CI/CD processes and specific tooling.
  8. Setting up and managing databases.
  9. Setup and administration of virtual machines in project networks.
  10. Linking project networks to customer networks, including communication and coordination with customer IT.
  11. Migration and optimization of tools and solutions, including security checks.

Requirements

  1. Minimum 4+ years of experience
  2. Vocational training as an IT specialist for system integration or application development, or comparable qualification.
  3. Experience in network administration (IP, subnetworks, firewall configuration, etc.).
  4. Good knowledge of common operating systems (Windows, Linux/Unix) both as a user and as an administrator.
  5. Knowledge and experience in programming, scripting, and automation (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell, or similar technologies).
  6. Experience with CI/CD tools and environments (GitHub).
  7. Knowledge of cloud platforms and container technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  8. Experience with tools such as Kubernetes, Docker Swarm, or similar technologies.
  9. Knowledge of the administration and maintenance of SQL and NoSQL databases.
  10. Ability to develop solutions independently and autonomously.
  11. Strong communication and coordination skills, especially when dealing with customer IT (e.g., BMW, Volkswagen).

Apply with us

If you have experience and team spirit and are looking for a great place to work, then start your job with us.

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, in-tech is committed to equal employment opportunity without regard for age, race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

job_description:
Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager

About Fingent

At Fingent, we believe that technology can make a meaningful difference to the lives around us. We create and provide software that is beautiful, usable, and compelling to solve complex business challenges. We nurture smart people who bring out the best in themselves, their peers, and their clients. We are looking for an experienced Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager to join our Project Management Office (PMO) and help us continue our mission.

Key Responsibilities

As a Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager, you will be a key player in bridging the gap between business needs and technical solutions. You will be responsible for the full project lifecycle, ensuring successful delivery from conceptualization to completion. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include:

  • Acting as a trusted advisor to clients, quickly understanding their business processes, workflows, roles, and needs, and translating them into comprehensive business analysis documents that identify appropriate software features and functionality.
  • Conceptualizing and presenting solutions to clients, creating detailed user scenarios, workflows, and wireframes to illustrate your vision. Secure buy-in.
  • Evaluating and recommending off-the-shelf or open source solutions that can address customer challenges or technical requirements, either wholly or partially, to optimize project delivery and cost-effectiveness.
  • Collaborating with our design experts to create mockups that effectively communicate solution recommendations.
  • Guiding technical decisions in close collaboration with Development, DevOps, and QA managers, ensuring scalability, security, and maintainability of applications. Engaging with architects and developers to resolve issues and mitigate risks early.
  • Mentoring and developing senior business analysts, fostering their growth in requirements gathering, stakeholder management, and solution design.
  • Serving as a central point of communication, ensuring transparency and alignment between internal teams and external stakeholders throughout the project.
  • Building strong relationships with business stakeholders, product owners, and cross-functional teams to align on objectives, priorities, and expectations.
  • Proactively monitoring project progress, identifying potential risks and issues, and reporting them promptly.
  • Managing and documenting changes to the project scope, and communicating their impact to clients and relevant stakeholders.
  • Ensuring projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the agreed-upon scope.
  • Handling multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced environment while consistently delivering high-quality results.

Qualifications & Experience

To excel in this role, you should possess a blend of technical knowledge, strong communication skills, and a strategic mindset.

  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Experience: 12+ years of IT experience with at least 5 years in project management or similar leadership roles. Experience range: 10 - 15 Years.
  • Technical Acumen: Able to discuss architectures, APIs, data models, and cloud/SaaS patterns.
  • Team Leadership: Proven track record of managing distributed development teams across different time zones.
  • Communication & Negotiation: Exceptional communication, negotiation, and stakeholder management skills.
  • Domain Experience (Preferred): Experience in one or more of the following domains is an added advantage: Logistics, Aviation, Supply Chain Management, or Insurance.

Required Skills

job_description:

Introduction

We are looking for candidates with 7+ years of experience for the role of SAP BW Consultant.

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced SAP BW Consultant with a strong background in ABAP development, ECC extractors, and SAP HANA. The role involves designing, developing, and implementing SAP BW solutions and BI reporting. A sound understanding of the Retail business domain, with desirable knowledge of BW/MM/SD SAP modules and data warehousing concepts & dimensional modeling, is expected.

Responsibilities

  • Understand existing design and implementation BW data models (InfoProviders, DSO/ADSOs, CompositeProviders, MultiProviders, InfoCubes).
  • Document BW transformation rules, BEX formulas, and maintain documentation.
  • Integrate BW with front-end tools (BO, Analysis for Office, etc.).
  • Work with standard and custom ECC extractors (e.g., extractors 2LIS, 0FI, 0CO*).
  • Debug and troubleshoot data extraction and load issues.
  • Document ABAP routines in BW transformations.
  • Integrate data sources from non-SAP systems via BODS or SD.
  • Design and optimize data flows using BW/4HANA or embedded BW.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills:

  • 7+ years of hands-on SAP BW development and support experience.
  • Proficiency in SAP ABAP skills.
  • Proven experience with ECC extractors (standard & custom) across SD, MM, FI, CO modules.
  • Strong understanding of SAP data dictionary objects, modules, and integration with other SAP modules.
  • Strong knowledge of data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.
  • Experience with Process Chain, scheduling, and monitoring.
  • Strong knowledge of InfoProviders, InfoCubes, DSOs, and Query Design.

Secondary Skills:

  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.
  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

Certifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • SAP BW related certification or relevant SAP certifications are desirable but not mandatory.

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

We contact our candidates only through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related mails are sent through the official HR email ID. Please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification/alerts on this subject.

PCB Designer (Contract Basis)

  • Location: Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram (Onsite)
  • Project Type: Ongoing IoT / Embedded Hardware Development Project
  • Educational Qualification: B.Tech / B.E., Diploma
  • Duration: 2 to 3 Months (Contract Basis)

About the Role:

Zybo Tech Lab is seeking a skilled PCB Designer to join our R&D electronics team for an ongoing embedded systems project. This role is crucial for designing a custom ESP32-based UWB hardware board, encompassing both Tag and Anchor components. Key responsibilities include antenna redesign, PCB optimization, and generating comprehensive manufacturing documentation. This is a full-time, onsite position in Thiruvananthapuram, offering a fantastic opportunity to collaborate with our engineering team on cutting-edge IoT and embedded hardware solutions. The ideal candidate will possess significant experience in RF and high-speed PCB design and a proven ability to deliver production-ready hardware.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should submit their updated resume along with a brief cover letter to jobs@zybotechlab.com.

Key Responsibilities & Required Skills:

  • Design and develop multi-layer PCBs using industry-standard tools such as Altium, KiCad, or Eagle.
  • Redesign and optimize antenna structures to enhance range and signal performance.
  • Collaborate closely with hardware and firmware engineers to ensure seamless integration.
  • Prepare all necessary manufacturing deliverables, including Gerber files, Bill of Materials (BOM), and Pick & Place files.
  • Conduct Design for Manufacturability (DFM) checks, perform signal integrity analysis, and ensure EMI/EMC compliance.
  • Coordinate with PCB fabricators and assembly vendors for the production of prototypes.
  • Demonstrate a strong understanding of RF circuit design, high-frequency routing techniques, and power management principles.
  • Exhibit familiarity with ESP32 microcontrollers and UWB transceivers (Decawave DW1000/DW3000 preferred).
  • (Preferred) Contribute to enclosure design to ensure proper mechanical fit and alignment within the product.
  • Possess excellent collaboration and debugging skills for hardware validation.
  • Proficiency with antenna simulation tools (e.g., CST, HFSS, ADS).
  • Experience in designing IoT hardware or wireless communication modules.
  • Understanding of embedded firmware concepts for hardware testing and validation purposes.
summary: Seeking an experienced PCB Designer for an IoT/Embedded Hardware project in Thiruvananthapuram. Design ESP32-based UWB hardware, optimize antennas, and prepare manufacturing documentation.

The role involves building intelligent systems that integrate Large Language Models (LLMs) with document retrieval for accurate, context-aware responses. This includes developing and refining ML/DL models, fine-tuning LLMs, and implementing retrieval systems using vector databases.

  • Implement prompt engineering strategies and hybrid approaches (rule-based + neural) to enhance model reliability.
  • Contribute to research and innovation in applied generative AI, and stay up-to-date with the latest in LLM, RAG, and MLOps ecosystems.

Preferred Skills:

  • Strong experience with RAG architectures and hybrid retrieval systems.
  • Solid hands-on knowledge of LLMs (e.g., GPT, Mistral, LLaMA, Claude, DeepSeek, etc.) and embedding models (e.g., SBERT, OpenAI, HuggingFace models).
  • Proficiency in machine learning / deep learning using PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers, etc.
  • Experience with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Weaviate, Pinecone, Qdrant).
  • Experience in text chunking, retrieval scoring, prompt tuning, or LoRA/PEFT methods.
  • Strong background in NLP, information retrieval, and knowledge graphs is a plus.

job_description:
Junior Business Analyst at Lean Transitions Solutions

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) Location: Basement Floor, Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Job Published: 30, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 06, Nov 2025

About Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS)

Founded over a decade ago with headquarters in the UK, Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 and Leadership 4.0 software solutions to world-class organizations, including Fortune 500 companies, with a global presence in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico. Our dedicated team ensures client requirements are met and our bespoke software solutions address industrial and manufacturing challenges across various sectors.

At LTS, we foster a culture rooted in core values: Respect for All, Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, Inclusiveness, and Empathy.

About the Role

LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) to join our growing team in Trivandrum. This role offers an exciting opportunity for individuals passionate about analysing business processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering technology-driven solutions. The successful candidate will assist in requirement gathering, documentation, and stakeholder communication, alongside supporting customer success activities. This position provides hands-on exposure to real-world projects, enabling the development of a strong foundation in business analysis and enterprise software implementation.

Department: Product / Projects Employment Type: Full-time

Key Learning Opportunities

  • Exposure to real-world business analysis in enterprise SaaS projects.
  • Hands-on experience with requirement management and testing processes.
  • Practical understanding of Agile methodologies and client communication.
  • Opportunity to grow into Senior Business Analyst, Product Owner, or Project Manager roles with experience.

Key Responsibilities

1. Business Requirement Analysis - Gather, analyse, and document business requirements in collaboration with Project Managers and clients. - Assist in preparing Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Specification Documents (FSD), and User Stories. - Translate business needs into clear, actionable requirements for technical teams. - Participate in requirement workshops, sprint planning, and review meetings. - Support gap analysis between business processes and system capabilities. - Assist in identifying, analysing, and documenting change requests and their impacts.

2. Process Modelling & Documentation - Map and document as-is and to-be processes using flowcharts, workflow diagrams, or tools like Visio, Lucidchart, or Draw.io. - Support process improvement initiatives and identify optimisation opportunities. - Maintain traceability matrices to ensure full coverage of business requirements through design and testing.

3. Project Coordination & Testing - Collaborate with cross-functional teams including developers, QA testers, and business stakeholders. - Assist in preparing User Acceptance Testing (UAT) scenarios, test cases, and documentation. - Coordinate UAT sessions, gather feedback, and document results. - Help ensure project deliverables meet business expectations and quality standards.

4. Customer & Stakeholder Communication - Act as a bridge between customers and internal teams, ensuring smooth and professional communication. - Respond to client queries and support issues via email, chat, or support systems. - Maintain and update customer documentation, FAQs, and training materials. - Track, escalate, and follow up on customer requests until resolution. - Assist in creating training documents and user manuals for end-users.

5. Research & Continuous Improvement - Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify industry trends and product enhancement opportunities. - Stay updated on business analysis methodologies, tools, and frameworks (Agile, Scrum, Lean, etc.). - Contribute to the continuous improvement of internal processes and templates.

Preferred Skills

  • Degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Recently Graduated).
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Good command of English (verbal and written); ability to document clearly and concisely.
  • Basic understanding of business processes, software development lifecycle (SDLC), and Agile methodologies.
  • Proficiency in MS Office tools (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and basic familiarity with Jira, Confluence, or similar tools.
  • Ability to multitask and prioritise in a fast-paced environment.
  • Proactive attitude with a strong willingness to learn and adapt.
  • Strong passion and interest in the field.

To Apply: Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line "Junior Business Analyst".
summary: Seeking a Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) to gather requirements, document processes, and support client communication. This role offers hands-on experience in enterprise SaaS projects and Agile methodologies.

job_description:
Marketing Coordinator

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Closing Date: 06, Nov 2025

About Us

Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS), headquartered in the UK, is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating for Industry 4.0. We deliver Lean Industry 4.0 and Leadership 4.0 software solutions to world-class organizations globally, with offices in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico. Our dedicated team ensures bespoke software solutions address industrial and manufacturing challenges across various sectors.

About the Role

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Marketing Coordinator to support our global marketing and lead-generation activities. The ideal candidate will have strong experience with HubSpot CRM (including automation and AI features) and the ability to coordinate effectively between the UK and India teams. This role is responsible for managing day-to-day marketing operations, coordinating content and campaigns, using automation to increase efficiency, and tracking performance through CRM and analytics tools.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Marketing Coordination

  • Support the execution of marketing plans and campaigns with the global marketing team.
  • Manage and update marketing collateral (case studies, one-pagers, capability decks, product sheets).
  • Coordinate social media posts, email campaigns, and digital content with internal teams.
  • Maintain and update marketing data, lead sources, and reports in HubSpot CRM.
  • Liaise with content writers, designers, and video creators to meet campaign deadlines.
  • Assist in tracking campaign results, lead engagement, and marketing analytics.

2. Marketing Plan Ownership & Team Coordination

  • Maintain and coordinate the marketing activity plan (daily, weekly, and monthly tasks).
  • Assign and track deliverables across SEO, content creation, digital design, and social media teams.
  • Support campaign planning, execution, and follow-up to ensure consistent messaging and output.
  • Monitor content calendars, posting schedules, and marketing priorities across regions.
  • Provide weekly updates on progress, blockers, and completed deliverables.

3. Market & Competitor Analysis

  • Conduct light market research to identify trends, audience shifts, and competitor positioning.
  • Support benchmarking activities to improve messaging, branding, or campaign direction.
  • Feed insights into campaign strategy, product positioning, and content relevance.
  • Track changes in digital engagement, industry events, or sector-specific opportunities.

4. Performance Tracking & CRM Reporting

  • Measure and report marketing KPIs such as:
    • Lead generation (Marketing Leads vs Sales Qualified Leads)
    • Campaign engagement (clicks, impressions, downloads, form fills)
    • Traffic sources (email, LinkedIn, website, referrals)
  • Track conversions and attribution using HubSpot CRM.
  • Share weekly or monthly dashboards with Sales and Leadership.
  • Optimize campaigns based on data insights and performance metrics.

5. AI & Automation

  • Use HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks.
  • Leverage tools like ChatGPT, Canva AI, Grammarly, Jasper, etc., for content support.
  • Improve efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates.
  • Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Preferred Skills

Required: - Proficiency with HubSpot CRM (marketing tools, automation, workflows). - Experience with digital content coordination and campaign execution. - Strong organizational and communication skills. - Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and deliverables. - Proficiency with Canva, Google Workspace, MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Docs). - Good Command in English (both verbal and written). - 2–4 years in marketing coordination, campaign support, or CRM-based marketing.

Bonus / Preferred: - Knowledge of CMS, marketing automation tools, or social publishing tools. - Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva AI, Grammarly). - Prior experience supporting UK/Europe teams. - Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business, Communications, or equivalent.

How to Apply

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Marketing Coordinator”. Please include the following information in the email content: - Current CTC: - Expected CTC: - Notice Period: - Current Location: - Total Relevant Experience: - Willingness to work at the office:

job_description:
Pre-Sales Business Analyst

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Job Published: 30, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 06, Nov 2025

About the Role

Lean Transitions Solutions is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Pre-Sales Business Analyst. This role is crucial in supporting the sales cycle by translating customer needs into clear, solution-ready requirements and documentation. You will collaborate closely with the PMO Delivery Director, while also providing pre-sales support to the Strategic Business Director and Sales & Customer Success Executive. Your responsibilities will include requirement gathering, solution scoping, and preparing technical inputs for proposals and demos. The ideal candidate will ensure customer expectations are accurately understood, documented, and aligned with product capabilities before transitioning to delivery teams. This role may also involve supporting early delivery phases for smooth implementation planning.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Pre-Sales Discovery & Requirements Gathering

    • Attend client discovery calls and demos alongside sales representatives.
    • Capture and document business needs, workflows, and functional expectations.
    • Clarify objectives, use cases, and customer challenges early in the sales cycle.
    • Translate discussions into structured requirement notes or actionable briefs.

  2. Solution Scoping & Technical Documentation

    • Develop preliminary solution outlines, scope summaries, and feature mappings.
    • Create draft Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) or Functional Specifications (FSDs) as needed.
    • Produce workflow diagrams, wireframes, or configuration concepts with designer team support (using tools like Figma, Lucidchart, Visio).
    • Align proposed solutions with product capabilities and delivery feasibility in coordination with the PMO.

  3. Proposal & Technical Input Support

    • Contribute technical and functional sections to proposals, SOWs, capability decks, and solution documentation.
    • Provide supporting materials such as feature breakdowns, workflow references, screenshots, or demo visuals.
    • Coordinate with PMs, Product Teams, and Solutions Architects to validate effort, timelines, and scope.
    • Ensure documentation libraries, templates, and proposal-related assets are current and accurate.

  4. Demo Support & Client Workshops

    • Assist in tailoring and preparing demos based on client requirements.
    • Support solution walkthroughs by demonstrating functionality, workflows, or configuration concepts.
    • Capture questions, required modifications, and follow-up actions from demos or workshops.
    • Provide functional clarity to Sales & Customer Success and Product Delivery teams.

  5. Collaboration with Sales, Marketing & Technical Teams

    • Work with the Sales & Customer Success Executive to align scope, requirements, and customer expectations.
    • Provide technical input to marketing collateral showcasing system workflows or configurations.
    • Support design and content teams with diagrams, Figma links, functionality clarifications, or feature visuals.
    • Coordinate early solution feasibility with PMO, developers, and product architects.

  6. Delivery Handover & Flexible BA Support (Post-Sale)

    • Prepare structured handover notes for PMO, BA, and delivery teams to begin implementation.
    • Clarify assumptions, workflows, deliverables, and effort during pre-kick-off activities.
    • Transition temporarily into a Business Analyst role during project initiation where needed.
    • Support configuration workshops, requirement validation, and solution alignment during onboarding.

Preferred Skills, Experience & Background:

  • Experience: 2–4 years in pre-sales, business analysis, solution consulting, or functional coordination within a software/SaaS/IT environment.
  • Team Collaboration: Experience working with delivery, product, or technical teams to translate requirements into solutions.
  • Lifecycle Familiarity: Familiarity with software implementation lifecycles and client discovery processes.

Tools & Systems:

  • Microsoft Office/365: Strong experience (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).
  • Project Tracking: Working knowledge of Jira or similar tools.
  • Diagramming/Workflow Tools: Experience using Visio, Lucidchart, Figma, Miro.

Skills & Capabilities:

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to gather, structure, and document requirements clearly.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams (Sales, PMO, Delivery).
  • Good attention to detail and ability to handle multiple priorities.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s degree in IT, Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.

Preferred Industry & Product Knowledge:

  • Exposure to Lean, manufacturing, logistics, or process improvement environments.
  • Understanding of SaaS platforms, workflow-based systems, or ERP/MES/QMS tools.

Preferred Proposal & Demo Involvement:

  • Experience contributing to proposals, solution decks, or SOWs.
  • Exposure to software demos, configuration showcases, or pre-sales workshops.

Preferred Collaboration & Market Alignment:

  • Experience working with UK/Europe or international clients.
  • Ability to provide input into marketing or sales collateral from a functional perspective.

Nice-to-Have Tools & Technology:

  • Familiarity with HubSpot or CRM platforms (for viewing/updating deal notes).
  • Experience using Figma or similar design reference tools.
  • Awareness of AI tools (ChatGPT, Copilot, Jasper, etc.) for documentation support.

Preferred Methodologies & Delivery Context:

  • Understanding of SDLC, Agile, or hybrid project methodologies.
  • Ability to work with PMs/BAs during solution handover or onboarding.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates should forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Pre-Sales Business Analyst”. Please include the following information in the email content:

  • Current CTC:
  • Expected CTC:
  • Notice Period:
  • Current Location:
  • Total Relevant Experience:
  • Willingness to work at the office:

Location: Technopark, Karyavattom PO, Thirivananthapuram, Kerala, 695581

Contact Email: hr@srswebsolutions.com

Closing Date: 30, November 2025

Job Published: 30, October 2025

Company Description

SRS Web Solutions is a leading healthcare SaaS technology company specializing in digital healthcare documentation for the medical, dental, and veterinary industries. We have served over 3,000+ clients and 5 million patients worldwide, modernizing practices by improving productivity, efficiencies, and the bottom line. Our senior software developers have a collective 100,000 hours in customized healthcare and security programming. SRS is an Inc 5000 company ranked as the fastest-growing company in the USA.

Role Description:

  • Test Strategy & Planning: Develop, document, and implement comprehensive test plans and strategies for new and existing software.
  • Manual & Automated Testing: Perform both manual and automated tests to ensure product functionality, reliability, and performance.
  • Test Case Design & Execution: Design and execute test cases, including functional, regression, integration, and performance testing.
  • Defect Identification & Tracking: Identify, report, and track software defects using bug-tracking tools, and work closely with development teams to ensure timely resolution.
  • Team Leadership: Mentor and guide junior QA engineers, fostering best practices in testing, automation, and quality assurance.
  • Continuous Improvement: Continuously improve testing processes, tools, and methodologies to optimize efficiency and accuracy.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure high-quality software releases.
  • Performance Testing: Lead efforts in stress and performance testing to ensure that the software can handle high traffic and heavy use.
  • Documentation: Maintain clear documentation of test processes, results, and defect reports.

Preferred Skills:

  • Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Engineering, Computer Science, or related discipline)
  • 5+ years of experience in both Manual and Automation Testing, with proven experience as a Senior QA Engineer
  • Strong hands-on experience with Selenium, Java, and Page Object Model (POM) design patterns
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and tools such as Jenkins and GitHub
  • Skilled in testing RESTful APIs using tools like Postman and SwaggerUI
  • Solid knowledge of SQL and ability to write and execute complex queries
  • Understanding of JSON structures and ability to create, edit, and apply them in testing
  • Experience in Agile environments and Data-Driven Testing
  • Proven ability to build test automation frameworks from scratch for Web Applications
  • Strong understanding of functional and non-functional testing
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills
  • Ability to prioritize, work on parallel tasks, and deliver high-quality results under deadlines.
summary: Lead QA efforts for a healthcare SaaS company. Responsibilities include test strategy, manual/automated testing, and team leadership. Requires 5+ years of experience with Selenium and Java.

company: Timesworld Media And Technology Solutions (P) Ltd
job_description:
AI Architect - Urgent Opening

Company: Timesworld Media and Technology Solutions (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Kerala Contact Email: hr.tvm@timesworld.com Website: https://www.timesworld.com Closing Date: 15, Nov 2025 Job Published: 30, Oct 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking a visionary and highly skilled AI Architect to join our leadership team. This pivotal role will be responsible for defining and implementing the end-to-end architecture for deploying our machine learning models, including advanced Generative AI and LLM solutions, into production. You will lead and mentor a talented cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Backend Developers, and DevOps Engineers, fostering a culture of innovation, technical excellence, and operational efficiency.

Key Responsibilities

Architectural Leadership:

  • Design, develop, and own the scalable, secure, and reliable end-to-end architecture for deploying and serving ML models, with a strong focus on real-time inference and high availability.
  • Lead the strategy and implementation of the in-house API wrapper infrastructure for exposing ML models to internal and external customers.
  • Define architectural patterns, best practices, and governance for MLOps, ensuring robust CI/CD pipelines, model versioning, monitoring, and automated retraining.
  • Evaluate and select the optimal technology stack (cloud services, open-source frameworks, tools) for our ML serving infrastructure, balancing performance, cost, and maintainability.

Team Leadership & Mentorship:

  • Lead, mentor, and inspire a diverse team of Data Scientists, Backend Developers, and DevOps Engineers, guiding them through complex architectural decisions and technical challenges.
  • Foster a collaborative environment that encourages knowledge sharing, continuous learning, and innovation across teams.
  • Drive technical excellence, code quality, and adherence to engineering best practices within the teams.

Generative AI & LLM Expertise:

  • Architect and implement solutions for deploying Large Language Models (LLMs), including strategies for efficient inference, prompt engineering, and context management.
  • Drive the adoption and integration of techniques like Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) to enhance LLM capabilities with proprietary and up-to-date information.
  • Develop strategies for fine-tuning LLMs for specific downstream tasks and domain adaptation, ensuring efficient data pipelines and experimentation frameworks.
  • Stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI, particularly in Generative AI, foundation models, and emerging MLOps tools, and evaluate their applicability to our business needs.

Collaboration & Cross-Functional Impact:

  • Collaborate closely with Data Scientists to understand model requirements, optimize models for production, and integrate them seamlessly into the serving infrastructure.
  • Partner with Backend Developers to build robust, secure, and performant APIs that consume and serve ML predictions.
  • Work hand-in-hand with DevOps Engineers to automate deployment, monitoring, scaling, and operational excellence of the AI infrastructure.
  • Communicate complex technical concepts and architectural decisions effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Requirements

Education:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related quantitative field.

Experience:

  • 10+ years of progressive experience in software engineering, with at least 5+ years in an Architect or Lead role.
  • Proven experience leading and mentoring cross-functional engineering teams (Data Scientists, Backend Developers, DevOps).
  • Demonstrated experience in designing, building, and deploying scalable, production-grade ML model serving infrastructure from the ground up.

Technical Skills:

  • Deep expertise in MLOps principles and practices, including model versioning, serving, monitoring, and CI/CD for ML.
  • Strong proficiency in Python and experience with relevant web frameworks (e.g., FastAPI, Flask) for API development.
  • Expertise in containerization technologies (Docker) and container orchestration (Kubernetes) for large-scale deployments.
  • Hands-on experience with at least one major cloud platform (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and their AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML).
  • Demonstrable experience with Large Language Models (LLMs), including deployment patterns, prompt engineering, and fine-tuning methodologies.
  • Practical experience implementing and optimizing Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.
  • Familiarity with distributed systems, microservices architecture, and API design best practices.
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, Datadog).
  • Knowledge of infrastructure as code (IaC) tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).

Leadership & Soft Skills:

  • Exceptional leadership, mentorship, and team-building abilities.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a track record of driving complex technical initiatives to completion.
  • Excellent communication (verbal and written) and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to diverse audiences.
  • Strategic thinker with the ability to align technical solutions with business objectives.
  • Proactive, self-driven, and continuously learning mindset.

Bonus Points:

  • Experience with specific ML serving frameworks like BentoML, KServe/KFServing, TensorFlow Serving, TorchServe, or NVIDIA Triton Inference Server.
  • Contributions to open-source MLOps or AI projects.
  • Experience with data governance, data security, and compliance in an AI context.

To Apply: All applications are to be sent by clicking the following link in our website: https://www.timesworld.com/careers/ai-architect
summary: Seeking a visionary AI Architect to lead ML model deployment, including Generative AI and LLMs. Responsibilities include architecture design, team leadership, and MLOps implementation.

job_description:

Company: Edwiza Solutions (P) Ltd Location: 3rd Floor, CDAC Building, Technopark, 695581 Website: http://www.edwiza.com Contact Email: careers@edwiza.com Job Published: 30, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 14, Dec 2025

Brief Description

Are you passionate about learning, creativity, and storytelling? At Edwiza Solutions (P) Ltd, we design engaging, learner-focused eLearning experiences — and we’re looking for Instructional Designer Trainees to join our growing team! This is an excellent opportunity for freshers who have a flair for writing, good command of English, and a keen interest in how people learn.

Job Type:

Fresher

Who Can Apply

  • Freshers or recent graduates with a strong grasp of English (both written and spoken).
  • Those who have a natural ability to understand, analyze, and simplify content for others.
  • Individuals who enjoy organizing ideas, creating flow in learning materials, and thinking from a learner’s perspective.

What You’ll Do

  • Analyze source content and transform it into engaging, easy-to-understand learning materials.
  • Draft course scripts, learning objectives, and assessments based on instructional design principles.
  • Collaborate with visual designers and developers to create interactive, visually appealing eLearning modules.
  • Learn and apply eLearning tools and standards.

Preferred Skills & What We’re Looking For

  • Strong Comprehension & Writing Skills: You can read complex content, understand it thoroughly, and rewrite it in a simple, learner-friendly way.
  • Instructional Design Aptitude: You’re curious about how people learn and can organize information logically to make it engaging and effective.
  • Creativity: You enjoy brainstorming ideas to make learning more visual, interactive, and impactful.
  • Attention to Detail: You care about structure, tone, and clarity.

Added Advantage

  • Basic graphic design skills or a good visual sense (Canva, PowerPoint, or other design tools).
  • Experience in creative writing, content creation, or teaching.

Qualifications:

  • Hold a Bachelor's or Master's degree.
  • Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite (Word, PowerPoint, and Excel).

How to Apply

If you’re excited to start your career in eLearning and have a creative spark, we’d love to hear from you! Send your resume and portfolio (writing samples, course content, graphic design samples or any creative work) to careers@edwiza.com with the Subject - IDT_25. A resume without the email's subject will either be put on hold or rejected.
summary: Edwiza Solutions seeks Instructional Designer Trainees. This role is for freshers to transform content into engaging learning experiences using strong writing and analytical skills.

Research Associate - III

Organization: Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management - Kerala (IIITM-K) Location: IIITM-K Campus, Technopark, Karyavattom PO, Thiruvananthapuram, 695581 Website: http://www.iiitmk.ac.in Contact Email: jobs@iiitmk.ac.in

Closing Date: October 31, 2025 Job Published: October 30, 2025

Brief Description

The Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management – Kerala (IIITM-K) is an institute established by the Government of Kerala, focusing on promoting entrepreneurship and research in electronics and IT. For more information, please visit www.iiitmk.ac.in.

IIITM-K, on behalf of a DBT sponsored project titled “Investigation of a novel spatio-temporal unwrapping error reduction algorithm on clinical feature extraction in SWI”, invites applications for the following post for a period of three-year contract.

Applications must be submitted online through https://forms.gle/9HCx4dmdzcqV1jsr5 before 4:00 PM on October 31, 2025.

Description

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Research Associate with expertise in Bio Medical Signal Processing, especially MRI.

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Lead the DBT-funded project; prepare interim reports and all communications required by the funding agency.
  • Work closely with the team to design, implement, and validate algorithms and toolboxes for MRI phase unwrapping.
  • Deliver high-quality scientific insight and programmatic support for translational science initiatives.
  • Lead grant and proposal writing.
  • Travel to collaborator sites and organize meetings.
  • Establish and maintain partnerships with relevant researchers and academic institutions.

Qualifications

Essential: - PhD in Electronics or a closely related field with ≥ 2 years of post-doctoral experience; OR - M.Tech. in Applied Electronics & Instrumentation (or related area) with ≥ 7 years of post-M.Tech. experience. - At least one research publication in a Science Citation Index (SCI)–indexed journal.

Desirable: - Experience with government-funded research projects in roles of Research Associate or above. - Proven expertise in biomedical signal processing, particularly MRI.

Preferred Skills and Competencies

  • Strong problem-solving ability, meticulous attention to detail, and the capacity to work both independently and in collaborative teams.
  • Clear, effective communication – able to convey complex technical concepts and coordinate across disciplines.
  • Proven experience in algorithm development using MATLAB and/or Python.
  • Excellent scientific writing: manuscript preparation, technical documentation, and related professional communications for an imaging/computing laboratory.
summary: Research Associate needed for DBT-funded MRI project. Responsibilities include leading research, algorithm development, reporting, and proposal writing. Requires PhD or M.Tech with publication and relevant experience.

job_description:
Associate Technical Architect - JavaScript

Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Kerala (Technopark Phase III) Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Published Date: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 04, Nov 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company with over 17 years of experience in providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption.

Our expertise spans multiple technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, and Vue.js, catering to various industry verticals worldwide.

About the Role:

We are seeking an experienced Solution Architect with strong JavaScript expertise to design, develop, and oversee the implementation of scalable, high-performing web and cloud solutions. The ideal candidate will combine deep technical knowledge with strategic vision to ensure our systems meet both functional and non-functional requirements.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Architect Solutions: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and secure application architectures, ensuring alignment with best practices and industry standards.
  • Full-Stack Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of both front-end and back-end web applications using Angular or React, and Node.js.
  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, etc., to ensure scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance and leadership to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and ensure project deadlines are met.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance, both on the client-side and server-side, to provide a seamless user experience.
  • Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the evolution of development processes, methodologies, and tooling, driving the adoption of new technologies and practices.
  • Code Reviews & Best Practices: Lead code reviews, enforce coding standards, and maintain high levels of test coverage (unit, integration, E2E).

Preferred Skills & Qualifications:

  • At least 3+ years of experience as an architect designing large-scale applications.
  • 8+ years of experience in full-stack development with strong proficiency in Angular or React, Node.js, and JavaScript/TypeScript.
  • Strong knowledge of design patterns (e.g., MVC, Observer, Module), software architecture principles, and UML modelling.
  • In-depth experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure, including services like EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, and more.
  • Strong experience in backend development with Node.js, including building and integrating REST APIs, middleware, and microservices.
  • Extensive experience with front-end frameworks like Angular or React, including component-driven architecture, state management (e.g., NgRx, Redux), and UI performance optimization.
  • Experience with databases, both SQL (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB), including database design, query optimization, and migrations.
  • Expertise in version control systems, particularly Git, with an understanding of Git workflows and branching strategies.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform for containerization and infrastructure management.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques, including bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, and caching.
  • TypeScript experience and fluency.
  • Familiarity with serverless architectures (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) for event-driven architectures.
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies, and leading cross-functional teams.
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
  • Familiarity with GraphQL and building modern, flexible APIs.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs (for training hours, certifications, special value to business through ideas and innovation).
  • Work-life balance, including flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

Our expertise spans various domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, Vue, and more, catering to diverse industry verticals worldwide.

What's Important to Us:

We are looking for experienced Senior AI/ML Engineers to drive new business opportunities internationally. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and generating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for text, code, and multi-modal data use cases.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage scalable, observable, and cost-efficient ML pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure).
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Manage the entire model lifecycle from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Preferred Skills & Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop and demonstrate proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions to business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns for native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in web-scale services and pipelines.
  • Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience building at least one production-grade Deep Learning or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming, including code optimization, profiling, multi-threading, multiprocessing, OOP, and design principles.
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Python (Object-oriented concepts, optimization, multi-threading, multiprocessing, OOP design).
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI (must-have).

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models (text, vision, audio).
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and performance-based encashment options.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment with experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for bonus programs (training hours, certifications, innovation).
  • Work-life balance, flexible work timings, early out Fridays, social and cultural activities.
  • Company-sponsored international tours.
