Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India , 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Job Published: October 29, 2025 Closing Date: November 07, 2025

Introduction

We are looking for candidates with 10+ years of experience for this role.

Job Description

A minimum of 10 years of experience in data engineering is required, encompassing the development and scaling of data warehouse and data lake platforms. The candidate should possess a strong background in Snowflake, demonstrating leadership in technical design, architecture, and implementation of complex data solutions.

Working Hours: 8 hours, with a mandatory few hours of overlap during the EST Time zone for meetings. The working hours will be 12 PM - 9 PM.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design and architecture of data solutions leveraging Snowflake, ensuring scalability, performance, and reliability.
  • Oversee the implementation of data pipelines, ETL processes, and data governance frameworks within Snowflake environments.
  • Ensure efficient data extraction from SAP BW/ECC systems.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical specifications and data models.
  • Develop and maintain data architecture standards, guidelines, and best practices, including data governance principles and DataOps methodologies.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to data engineering teams, fostering skill development and knowledge sharing.
  • Conduct performance tuning and optimization of Snowflake databases and queries.
  • Stay updated on emerging trends and advancements in Snowflake, cloud data technologies, data governance, and DataOps practices.

Mandatory Skills:

  • Snowflake Experience
  • Data Architecture Experience
  • ETL Process Experience
  • Large Data Migration Solutioning Experience

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills:

  • Extensive experience in designing and implementing data solutions using Snowflake.
  • DBT experience.
  • Proficiency in data modeling, schema design, and optimization within Snowflake environments.
  • Strong understanding of cloud data warehousing concepts and best practices, particularly with Snowflake.
  • Expertise in Python/Java/Scala, SQL, ETL processes, and data integration techniques, with a focus on Snowflake.
  • Familiarity with other cloud platforms and data technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Demonstrated experience in implementing data governance frameworks and DataOps practices.
  • Familiarity with real-time streaming technologies and Change Data Capture (CDC) mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of data governance principles and DataOps methodologies.
  • Proven track record of architecting and delivering complex data solutions in cloud platforms/Snowflake.

Secondary Skills:

  • Understanding of SAP BW/ECC systems, including data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL/ELT) processes.
  • Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
  • Experience in designing, developing, and implementing SAP ABAP programs, reports, interfaces, and enhancements.
  • Working experience in SAP environments.
  • Knowledge of data security and compliance standards.
  • Proficiency in SAP ABAP (Advanced Business Application Programming) development.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to juniors and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment and lead cross-functional initiatives.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Job Applications:

This is to notify job seekers that some fraudsters are promising jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Please note that no payment is ever sought for jobs in Reflections. We contact our candidates only through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related emails are sent through the official HR email ID. Please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification or alerts on this subject.

job_description:
Solution Architect (Optimizely)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Published: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking a highly experienced Solution Architect with over 12 years of experience to lead a significant migration project from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud. This role requires a technical leader to design a scalable, secure, and future-proof architecture.

Job Description

The Solution Architect will be the technical leader responsible for defining the architecture for a large-scale migration from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud. The ideal candidate possesses deep expertise in enterprise commerce systems, cloud architecture, and system integrations. Responsibilities include guiding development teams, enforcing best practices, and taking full ownership of the architecture and development transition.

Responsibilities:

Architecture & Design - Define the end-to-end migration architecture from SAP B2B to Optimizely, including CMS, Commerce, and PIM integration. - Design scalable, secure, and high-performance frameworks aligned with business goals. - Establish data migration strategies for products, pricing, and customer hierarchies. - Ensure API integration between SAP, Optimizely, and other enterprise systems.

Technical Leadership - Lead and mentor development teams on best practices and coding standards. - Collaborate with Optimizely consultants and internal teams to validate feasibility and technical approach. - Drive DevOps strategy for CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud deployment.

Project Ownership - Act as the technical owner of the migration project, taking over from the vendor after initial phases. - Ensure alignment with enterprise security and compliance standards. - Provide technical guidance during feasibility analysis and pilot module migration.

Collaboration & Communication - Work closely with Business Analysts to translate requirements into technical solutions. - Communicate architecture decisions to stakeholders and leadership in business-friendly terms. - Support QA teams with test strategy for performance, integration, and security.

Back-End (.NET):

  • Microservices Architecture: Designing loosely coupled services for scalability.
  • CI/CD Pipelines: Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins for automated deployments.

Business & Domain Knowledge:

Secondary Skills:

Back-End:

  • GraphQL: For flexible data querying if used in Optimizely extensions.

  • Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes for deployment and scaling.

Integration & DevOps:

Soft Skills:

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking candidates with 3+ years of experience for the role of Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). This position focuses on ensuring the quality and reliability of our SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration. The role requires a blend of strong programming and Quality Assurance expertise to design, develop, and execute automated and manual tests.

Job Description

The SDET will be responsible for validating functional workflows, API integrations, and data accuracy. Key activities include building automation frameworks, integrating tests into CI/CD pipelines, and collaborating with development and business teams to deliver a robust and scalable solution.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain automated test suites using .NET Core/C#, Selenium, or Playwright.
  • Perform API testing for ECC-Optimizely integrations using Postman or RestSharp.
  • Validate migrated data using SQL queries and backend checks.
  • Implement unit and integration tests with xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest.
  • Set up and manage test pipelines in Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Conduct functional, regression, and end-to-end testing for ecommerce workflows.
  • Perform performance testing using JMeter, k6, or similar tools.
  • Ensure secure API practices and basic security testing (OWASP awareness).
  • Collaborate in Agile teams, participate in sprint planning, and report defects in JIRA or Azure Boards.
  • Generate test reports using ExtentReports, Allure, or custom dashboards.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills: - Technical Testing: - .NET Core / C#: Strong programming skills for writing automated tests and test utilities. - API Testing: Experience with tools like Postman, RestSharp, or Swagger for testing ECC-Optimizely integrations. - Unit Testing Frameworks: Proficiency in xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest. - Test Automation: Building and maintaining automation suites using Selenium WebDriver or Playwright (for UI testing). - SQL & Data Validation: Writing queries to validate migrated data between ECC and Optimizely. - CI/CD Integration: Setting up test pipelines in Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins. - Functional & Integration Testing: - End-to-End Test Scenarios: Covering product catalog, pricing, inventory, and order workflows. - Regression Testing: Ensuring stability after each migration phase. - Error Handling & Logging: Implementing robust logging and exception tracking. - Quality Practices: - Test Strategy & Planning: Creating test plans aligned with migration phases. - Defect Management: Using tools like JIRA, Azure Boards, or TestRail. - Version Control: Git for managing test code and collaboration.

Secondary Skills: - Performance & Security Testing: - Load Testing Tools: JMeter, k6, or Locust for performance validation. - Security Testing Basics: Awareness of OWASP Top 10 and secure API practices. - SAP ECC Awareness: - Basic ABAP Understanding: To interpret ECC logic and validate data extraction. - ECC Data Models: Familiarity with tables like MARA, KNA1, VBAK for test data setup. - Optimizely Platform Familiarity: - Optimizely Commerce Workflows: Understanding how catalog and order flows work. - CMS Testing: Validating content rendering and personalization logic. - Collaboration & DevOps: - Test Reporting Tools: Extent Reports, Allure, or custom dashboards. - Agile Methodology: Working in sprints, attending stand-ups, and contributing to retrospectives.

Soft Skills

  • Strong communication and documentation abilities.
  • Analytical thinking to identify edge cases and potential data issues.
  • Proactive collaboration with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders.

Application Process

Interested candidates should forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd does not charge any fees for job applications. Be aware of fraudulent individuals who may promise employment for a fee. Please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarifications or to report suspicious activity.

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking experienced QA Analysts with 3+ years of experience for a critical role focused on SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration. We are looking for detail-oriented individuals to ensure the quality, accuracy, and reliability of this complex migration project.

Job Description

The QA Analyst will be responsible for manual testing, validating functional workflows, data integrity, and user experience across platforms. This role involves close collaboration with development and business teams to identify and resolve defects, contributing to test planning, execution, and reporting within an Agile environment.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Execute functional testing for Optimizely workflows (catalog, pricing, inventory, checkout).
  • Validate UI across browsers and devices for consistency and accessibility.
  • Perform data migration testing to ensure accuracy and completeness between SAP ECC and Optimizely.
  • Utilize SQL/Excel for backend data validation and business logic verification.
  • Log and track defects using JIRA, Azure DevOps, or TestRail.
  • Collaborate with developers and stakeholders to resolve issues and clarify requirements.
  • Prepare test plans, traceability matrices, and summary reports.
  • Conduct exploratory testing to identify edge cases and usability issues.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills:

  • Functional Testing:
  • Writing and executing manual test cases for Optimizely workflows (e.g., product catalog, pricing, inventory, checkout).
  • Performing UI validation across browsers and devices.
  • Logging and tracking defects using tools like JIRA, Azure DevOps, or TestRail.
  • Understanding Optimizely CMS/Commerce basics to validate content and commerce flows.
  • Data Migration Testing:
  • Validating data accuracy, completeness, and consistency between SAP ECC and Optimizely.
  • Familiarity with SAP ECC data models (e.g., MARA, KNA1, VBAK).
  • Using SQL or Excel for backend data comparison and validation.
  • Executing sample record checks and verifying business logic post-migration.
  • QA Fundamentals:
  • Strong grasp of test planning, test execution, and regression testing.
  • Ability to create traceability matrices and test summary reports.
  • Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments.
  • Exploratory Testing: Identifying edge cases and usability issues.

Secondary Skills:

  • Technical & Automation Awareness:
  • Basic SQL: For data validation and backend checks.
  • Basic understanding of API testing using Postman or Swagger.
  • Exposure to test automation tools like Selenium or Playwright (even if not hands-on).
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and how QA fits into release cycles.
  • SAP ECC Insights:
  • Ability to interpret ABAP logic or collaborate with SAP developers for test data setup.
  • Understanding of IDocs, BAPIs, or RFCs used in data extraction.
  • Optimizely Platform Knowledge:
  • Awareness of Optimizely personalization, content blocks, and catalog structures.
  • Understanding of customer journeys and how migrated data impacts user experience.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication and documentation abilities.
  • Analytical thinking to identify edge cases and potential data issues.
  • Proactive collaboration with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders.

How to Apply

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Please be aware that Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd never asks for payment for job applications. All communication will be through official channels (website, LinkedIn, official HR email). For any clarifications or alerts regarding potential fraud, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.

The Technical PM will be responsible for end-to-end delivery oversight, including team onboarding, vendor knowledge transition, governance, SLA adherence, and quality assurance. Team & Vendor Management - Lead team onboarding and ensure smooth transition of knowledge from vendors. - Act as the primary liaison between internal teams, vendors, and stakeholders. - Drive vendor handover strategy for architecture and development ownership.

Technical Oversight - Ensure alignment with solution architecture and technical standards. - Collaborate with architects and developers to resolve technical challenges. - Monitor integration, data migration, and performance testing activities.

Governance & Reporting - Maintain project documentation, dashboards, and progress reports. - Conduct status meetings and communicate updates to leadership. - Ensure compliance with security, quality, and enterprise standards.

Primary Skills: - Experience in migration projects – ideally SAP Hybris to Optimizely - Strong B2B domain knowledge – pricing, catalogs, workflows, customer hierarchies. - Hands-on technical understanding – .NET Core, APIs, CMS/Commerce Cloud concepts. - Proficiency in Agile project management – sprint planning, backlog management. - Excellent stakeholder communication and vendor management skills. - Strong governance and SLA management experience.

Secondary Skills: - Direct experience with Optimizely Commerce Cloud and Spire framework. - Experience with JS framework (React/Angular/VueJS) and CMS proficiency. - Familiarity with SAP Commerce Cloud (Hybris) architecture. - Knowledge of Azure cloud services and CI/CD pipelines. - Exposure to data migration strategies and performance optimization. - Certification in PMP or Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Soft Skills: - Leadership & Team Management – Ability to inspire, guide, and manage cross-functional teams. - Communication Skills – Clear and concise communication with technical and non-technical stakeholders. - Problem-Solving & Decision-Making – Ability to resolve issues quickly and make informed decisions. - Negotiation & Influencing – Skilled in managing vendor relationships and stakeholder expectations. - Adaptability – Comfortable with evolving priorities and dynamic project environments. - Conflict Resolution – Ability to handle disagreements and maintain team harmony. - Time Management & Prioritization – Ensures deadlines and deliverables are met efficiently.
